lockedCountry.title: Limited Taiwan to send
lockedCountry.desc: Consumers choose the transportation mode of the house and set the recipient model, limit the delivery address of Taiwan's domestic

useNotPayNow.title: Pay later
useNotPayNow.desc: In the checkout page, cooperate with the Green Internet ATM and the credit card, consumers can complete the order, choose the day to pay again

afterPaymentFail.title: Payment failed to cancel orders
afterPaymentFail.desc: When the order payment fails, the system will automatically cancel

autoAddStock.title: Cancel orders automatically add back inventory
autoAddStock.desc: When the order is canceled, the system will automatically replenish all the goods in the order.

isEnable.title: Paper invoice
isEnable.desc: Provide options to be two invoices, triple invoices, donations, and stores can check for actual needs

isEnable.title: Electronic invoice
isEnable.desc: Offering options: Membership / Mobile Barcode / Natural Man Document / Company / Donation, the store can be cheated on actual use needs.

lockedBirthday.title: Lock member birthday field
lockedBirthday.desc: Limit membership must not change your birthday information

isEnabled.title: Shopping expiration notice
isEnabled.desc: Let Members receive a reminder notice before the purchase of purchases.

backToTopButtonEnabled.title: Back to the top button
backToTopButtonEnabled.desc: Help consumer can quickly slide to the top of the page during purchase

shopperLoginMessageEnabled.title: Self-subscribe member registration with login page messages
shopperLoginMessageEnabled.desc: Members you can register with the login page in your store to display your own message content

wishList.title: Product collection
wishList.desc: After registering a member, you can collect the product collection.

productNotice.title: Commercial goods to notice
productNotice.desc: Members can subscribe to the short-selling goods under stock, and will receive a notice available after you replenishment

returnOrder.title: Return application
returnOrder.desc: Consumers can apply for goods to "shipped and unconscious orders" in order management

replacement.title: Exchange application
replacement.desc: Consumers can apply for goods to "shipped and unscated orders" in order management

memberSeePrice.title: Member visible price
memberSeePrice.desc: Consumers need to register a member to log in to see the price of goods

0.title: Language setting
0.tip: Select the language displayed by the default text of the foreground system

1.title: Currency category
1.tip: Convert the amount of goods in the foreground to the currency of the country for consumers to quickly convert the amount, but the actual order transaction amount is based on the currency set in the background

basic.title: Basic settings
basic.desc: Set the language and currency type supported by the store

checkout.title: Checkout settings
checkout.desc: Consumer checkout and shipping conditions related settings

checkoutUserSetting.name: Name
checkoutUserSetting.title: Checkout page Member information field
checkoutUserSetting.desc: You can fill in which membership information you need to fill in the consumer when you book your account.

tip.0: The price of all store products is the taxable / track category: general tax / preset tax category: tax tax
tip.1: * If you need to open duty-free or mixed invoices, please apply for tax categories in the green world, then change the product tax payment, so as not to open the invoice failed

MANUAL.name: Manual issuance
MANUAL.tip: Need to manually export the relevant information from the order data and issue the invoice to the electronic invoice platform

NOW.name: Open now
NOW.tip: When the account status of the order is "reconciliation completed", it will be automatically issued immediately

tip.0: When the account status is "reconciliation completed", set to automatically issue after 1 or 10 days
tip.1: If the order is cancelled within the set number of days, please go to the Green World backstage to manually delete the "Pending Invoice".
tip.2: If you have individual orders that need to be invoiced earlier than the scheduled days, please go to the order details and click the "Issued Now" button, and the invoice will be issued immediately.

invoice.title: Invoice setting
invoice.desc: Provide options for consumers to request invoice information at checkout, divided into paper invoices and electronic invoices

0.title: Order automation setting
0.tip: Automatically process order status and inventory quantity

1.title: Automatically cancel the order if payment fails
1.tip: Setting the account after setting the consumer remittance

order.title: Order management settings
order.desc: Control the status of automated order processing, inventory quantity, and customize the field template backfilled after consumer remittance

accessibility.title: Page accessibility
accessibility.desc: Related auxiliary functions can make consumers more comfortable shopping in the store
